entry.name: .slice
entry.description: Construct a new instance from a subset of the current instance's elements

signature.code: zq_subset = zq.slice( int start, int end )

argument.name: start
argument.description: The index of the element in the current instance to start the subset.

argument.name: end
argument.description: The subset will include elements up to, but not including, `end`.

returns.return: A new zQuery instance containing the subset elements
